channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CoreWeave prices its IPO to raise at least $2.2 billion. And now the games begin.
item.description: CoreWeave said on Wednesday that it hopes to sell its initial public shares between $47 and $55 per share, putting the money it may raise between abou...

item.title: A Livestreamed Tragedy on X Sparks a Memecoin Frenzy
item.description: When a young man from California broadcast his death on X, profit-hungry traders piled into a cryptocurrency created in his image.

item.title: Rerun’s open-source AI platform for robots, drones and cars revs up with $17M seed
item.description: As Generative AI moves increasingly into the physical world through robotics, vehicles and drones, the need to map cloud-based AIs to real-world envir...

item.title: Nearly All Cybertrucks Have Been Recalled Because Tesla Used the Wrong Glue
item.description: Tesla says it will fix the sticky issue—which could cause panels to detach from trucks while driving—with a new adhesive “not prone to environmental e...

item.title: Speediance Gym Monster 2 Review: All-in-One Workout Machine
item.description: This compact resistance machine lets you lift weights and get in your cardio, and it has thoughtful safety features.

item.title: DOGE Is Doing the Opposite of Government Auditing
item.description: On this special episode of Uncanny Valley, we talk about what federal auditors actually do, and what they think of DOGE.

item.title: Anthropic adds web search to its Claude chatbot
item.description: Anthropic’s AI-powered chatbot, Claude, can now search the web — a capability that had long eluded it. Web search is available now in preview for paid...

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

item.title: OpenAI upgrades its transcription and voice-generating AI models
item.description: OpenAI is bringing new transcription and voice-generating AI models to its API that the company claims improve upon its previous releases. For OpenAI,...

item.title: Threads adds new features to highlight topics and limit replies
item.description: Meta’s social network Threads, an X competitor with more than 320 million monthly active users, is now rolling out new features related to topics, rep...
